A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
We were doing so well with the last 2 Star Wars installments that we had to pause and make a prequel style cash grab flick.

SPOILERS

Mark Hamill couldn't save this film just like how Luke couldn't save Kylo Ren.
Huge vegan/animal rights messages side by side with product placement for the new cute toys that will infiltrate the holiday market. I dig the animal rights but the endless capitalism to make products by using poor comedic acts makes the film ever so cheap and tacky like a walmart knock of light saber that has no sound.
Visually it was beautiful. But God was never a facet of the star wars universe and the force isn't magic or some super power.
How many plot lines can we have and not progress any of the characters? While we're at it\, lets kill some off without any answer to who they were. Then let's fake you out in stupid thin plot twists.

In short\, do yourself favor and watch the Christmas special.
